mazesolver

Class MazeSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • mazesolver.MazeSolver

  • public class MazeSolver
extends java.lang.Object
    This class takes a maze and starting/end position and tries to find a solution.

    • Method Detail

      • solveMaze

        public static int[][] solveMaze(int[][] maze_array,
                                int staX,
                                int staY,
                                int endX,
                                int endY)
        Takes an array of the specified maze format and attempts to find the end from the start. 0 - Free space, 1 - Blocked space, 2 - Starting position, 3 - Traversed position, 4 - Ending position.
        Parameters:
        maze_array - - an array designed to be a maze
        staX - Starting X position
        staY - Starting Y position
        endX - Goal X position
        endY - Goal Y position
        Returns:
        Returns a modified array that represents a solution to the exit
